description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Invasion of Canada in 1775; including the Journal of Captain S. Thayer, describing the perils and sufferings of the Army under Colonel Benedict Arnold, in its March through the Wilderness to Quebec: with notes and appendix. [With map and plates.]" Author: STONE, Edwin Martin. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9555.eee.24." Page: 101 Place of Publishing: Providence Date of Publishing: 1867 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003513942 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
